fullText:
Elemental Might

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Genasi, warden
Benefit: When you use the encounter power associated with your racial manifestation, until the end of your next turn you gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls against creatures marked by you. This bonus increases to +3 at 11th level, and to +4 at 21st level.

Published in Dragon Magazine 379, page(s) 45.
name: Elemental Might
